articles.description: MIKE DICKSON IN NEW YORK: Raducanu was in tears during a practice session, as she appeared to be suffering from a wrist injury just days before her title defence at Flushing Meadows.
articles.content:
Emma Raducanu vowed to give her best at next week's US Open, despite appearing tearful at one stage during a near two-hour practice on Friday night.
